overview: As a multimedia reporter for The Deal, Katie Roof hosts and produces news videos for The Deal’s video team. In this role Katie interviews dealmakers from private equity firms, investment banks, law firms, hedge funds and corporations. Prior to joining The Deal, Katie worked at the William Morris Agency and held production roles at CNN and Bloomberg TV. Katie has a Masterâ€™s degree in Business and Economics Journalism from Columbia University.
